comment._content:
Photo is dated 4/01[?]/1913.  Written backwards.  Photo is touched up.

1913 was Rariden's fifth and last year playing for the Boston Braves in the National League.  He was the starting catcher.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the date in the source data and reload the description.
